title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average slid from record highs at the end of February, as the current stock market pullback continues. The best Dow Jones stocks to buy and watch in March 2021 are Apple, Disney, Microsoft and Visa.
item.title: Best Dow Jones Stocks To Buy And Watch In March 2021: Apple Rallies, Nike Dives 5% On Earnings
